REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Relates to certain police residency requirements
Summary: Authorizes every city with a population of more than ninety thousand but less than three hundred thousand to have the authority to enact a local law requiring any person who is appointed as a member of the police force of such city to be a resident of such city during his or her employment as a member of such police force; makes related provisions.
LawCode: Amd ยง3, Pub Off L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public officers law, in relation to certain police residency requirements
